data.comment: The match has started.
San Jose push upfield but Rosendo Mendoza quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 5, At Earthquakes Stadium, San Jose are penalized for being offside.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick Portland.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of Portland.
In the minute 12, Rosendo Mendoza awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Earthquakes Stadium, Nick Lima has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 16, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Portland's Julio Cascante gets in a shot on goal at Earthquakes Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
In the minute 19, San Jose to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andy Rios (San Jose) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
Portland's Diego Chara gets in a shot but it is blocked by a San Jose defender.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 21, Portland needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
Cristhian Paredes for Portland drives towards goal at Earthquakes Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
In the minute 23, Portland have been given a penalty at Earthquakes Stadium...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Diego Valeri.
Free kick for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 27, Goal! Portland increase their lead to 0-2 through a well-placed header from Jeremy Ebobisse.
Great play from Jorge Villafana to set up the goal.
In San Jose, San Jose push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick San Jose.
In the minute 29, Tomas Conechny (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Portland.
In the minute 30, San Jose are whistled for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to San Jose.
San Jose attack but Florian Jungwirth's header doesn't find the target.
Rosendo Mendoza awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 39, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In San Jose Portland drive forward through Marvin Loria. His shot is on target but it's saved.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, San Jose's Marcos Lopez is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Carlos Fierro. .
Marcos Lopez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, Can San Jose capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 45, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rosendo Mendoza blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a Portland throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Portland in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 46, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Yimmi Chara replacing Tomas Conechny.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Rosendo Mendoza awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 48, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Florian Jungwirth (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Rosendo Mendoza.
Attention is being given to Portlandâ€™s Diego Valeri and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 52, Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Portland's Diego Valeri looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Portland just outside San Jose's area.
Portland push forward at Earthquakes Stadium and Diego Valeri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined San Jose defence.
In the minute 56, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 57, Goal! Diego Valeri extends Portland's lead to 1-3.
Yimmi Chara with an assist there.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 60, Carlos Fierro (San Jose) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
San Jose's Carlos Fierro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 62, Portland have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a Portland throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 64, San Jose make their fourth substitution with Vako Qazaishvili replacing Florian Jungwirth.
Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's first substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Tommy Thompson replacing Eric Calvillo.
Chris Wondolowski is on a sub for Andy Rios for San Jose.
In the minute 64, Cristian Espinoza is replacing Nick Lima for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, San Jose are caught offside.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Great finish from Yimmi Chara to give Portland a 1-4 lead.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Portland.
Important block from the San Jose defence as Marvin Loria fires in a strike for Portland.
In the minute 73, Yimmi Chara for Portland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
San Jose are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cristian Espinoza gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
In the minute 76, Free kick in a good position for Portland!
Marvin Loria (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for Portland in San Jose.
Jack Skahan is replacing Shea Salinas for the home team.
Rosendo Mendoza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of San Jose.
The away team have replaced Marvin Loria with Andy Polo. This is the second substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
In the minute 82, Jaroslaw Niezgoda is replacing Jeremy Ebobisse for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
Rosendo Mendoza awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Rosendo Mendoza signals a throw-in for Portland, close to San Jose's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portland close to the penalty box.
Julio Cascante scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 1-5.
In the minute 85, That's a fine assist from Diego Valeri.
Jaroslaw Niezgoda puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-6.
That's a fine assist from Diego Chara.
In the minute 89, Rosendo Mendoza signals a San Jose throw-in in Portland's half.
The away team replace Cristhian Paredes with Renzo Zambrano.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a fifth substitution, with Eryk Williamson replacing Diego Chara.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Throw-in Portland.
Rosendo Mendoza will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Portland at Earthquakes Stadium.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
That's full-time at Earthquakes Stadium. The final score is 1-6.
